<script> // Set color scheme from local storage. (function() { const colorScheme = localStorage.getItem('color-scheme');

<script> // Set sidebar collapsed from local storage. (function() { const hasCollapsed = localStorage.getItem('sidebar-collapsed');

<style> /* Box Info */ .info-box-horizontal { display: flex; align-items: center; width: auto; /* Chiều rộng của box */ padding: 20px; background-color: #f3f3f3; border-radius: 30px; transition:background-color .15s ease }
.info-icon { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; background-color: #0000000f; border-radius: 50%; width: 50px; /* Đặt chiều rộng và chiều cao đồng nhất */ height: 50px; margin-right: 20px; /* Tạo khoảng cách giữa icon và nội dung */ }
.info-icon-svg { width: 38px; /* Kích thước icon */ height: 38px; color: #000; /* Màu icon */ }
.info-title { font-size: 1.1rem; font-weight: 600; color: #323232; margin: 0 0 10px; }
.info-description { font-size: 0.875rem; color: #4d4d4d; }
.btn-download { margin-left: auto; /* Đẩy nút Download sang bên phải */ display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #000; color: white; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 50px; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; }

<script> //<![CDATA[ window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){const headings=document.querySelectorAll('.post-content-teaser h2, .post-content-teaser h3, .post-content-teaser h4');const toc=document.querySelector('.toc');const ul=document.createElement('ul');let lastLi=null;let lastUl=ul;if(headings.length===0){document.getElementById('toc-container').style.display='none';return} headings.forEach((heading,index)=>{if(!heading.id){heading.id=`heading-${index}`} const id=heading.id;const text=heading.textContent;const listItem=document.createElement('li');const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=`#${id}`;link.textContent=text;link.addEventListener('click',function(e){e.preventDefault();const navbar=document.querySelector('.navbar');const navbarHeight=navbar?navbar.offsetHeight:0;const targetElement=document.getElementById(id);if(targetElement){const targetPosition=targetElement.getBoundingClientRect().top+window.scrollY-navbarHeight;window.scrollTo({top:targetPosition,behavior:'smooth'})}});if(heading.tagName.toLowerCase()==='h2'){lastUl=ul;lastUl.appendChild(listItem);lastLi=listItem}else if(heading.tagName.toLowerCase()==='h3'){let subUl=document.createElement('ul');if(!lastLi){lastUl.appendChild(listItem)}else{if(!lastLi.querySelector('ul')){lastLi.appendChild(subUl)}else{subUl=lastLi.querySelector('ul')} subUl.appendChild(listItem)} lastUl=subUl;lastLi=listItem}else if(heading.tagName.toLowerCase()==='h4'){let subUl=document.createElement('ul');if(!lastLi){lastUl.appendChild(listItem)}else{if(!lastLi.querySelector('ul')){lastLi.appendChild(subUl)}else{subUl=lastLi.querySelector('ul')} subUl.appendChild(listItem)} lastUl=subUl;lastLi=listItem} listItem.appendChild(link)});toc.appendChild(ul)}) //]]> </script> </div>

href="${link}"><img alt="${title}" src="${thumbnail}" loading="lazy"> <span class="card-post-image-badge"><span class="card-post-time">${publishedDate}</span></span></a><div class="card-post-content"><h3 class="card-post-title"><a href="${link}">${title}</a></h3><div class="card-post-meta">${tags}</div></div></article></div>`});$postList.append(item);$postList.removeClass('spinner-container');startIndex+=maxPostsPerPage;if(startIndex>=totalPosts){isEnd=!0;$('.pagination-button-next').addClass('complete').text("You've reached the end of the list");$postList.removeClass('spinner-container')}}else{$('#post-count').text(`0 posts`);isEnd=!0;$('.pagination-button-next').addClass('complete').text("No posts found.");$postList.removeClass('spinner-container')}}else{$('#post-count').text(`0 posts`);isEnd=!0;$('.pagination-button-next').addClass('complete').text("No posts found.");$postList.removeClass('spinner-container')}},error:function(){$postList.html('<p>Error loading feed. Please try again later.</p>');$postList.removeClass('spinner-container')},complete:function(){$('.pagination-button-next .loader').hide();if(!isEnd){$('.pagination-button-next .label').show()} $postList.removeClass('spinner-container')}})} loadPosts();$('.pagination-button-next').on('click',function(e){e.preventDefault();loadPosts()})}) //]]></script></b:if></b:if> <script src='https://unpkg.com/@popperjs/core@2'/> <script src='https://unpkg.com/tippy.js@6'/>
